caption: It's Dec 1, the first day of DDB San Francisco's Ad-vent Calendar! We'll be posting a gif about agency life every day til Xmas. This one's called "When you have a meeting room booked for 3:00 and someone else is still in there at 3:01."
Day 2: "When you finally have a day when you can leave at 5:00."
Day 3: "How it feels when your neighbor is playing their music without headphones" feat. The Stone Foxes.
Day 4: "When your annual review doesn't go as well as you expected."
Day 5: "When you forget to concept before a meeting but you have to present."
Day 6: "When someone says 'bye' at the end of a conference call and you had no idea they were dialed in."
Day 7: "When you finally get client approval after 26 rounds of creative."
Day 8: "When there's leftovers from a client lunch in the kitchen."
Day 9: "When it drops below 70 degrees in the office: women in full winter gear huddled around a computer screen with a fire on it."
Day 10: "When you lose a bet in the agency Fantasy league."
Day 11: "When someone says the v-word in a meeting."
Day 12: "When it hits 5 PM."
Day 13: "When it's office fridge clean-out day."
Day 14: "When you’re on 100 projects and your neighbor is on zero."
Day 15: "When ‘winning big in Vegas’ means getting a deck to the client by 5."
Day 16: "When you have back-to-back meetings tomorrow. And for the next 3 months."
Day 17: "When the fire alarm goes off."
Day 18: "When your agency holiday party was last night."
Day 19: "When someone responds with a reply-all to an all-agency email."
Day 20: "Too much for Advent."
Day 21: "When you find a typo in a final deck you just sent out."
Day 22: "When creatives try to dress up for a client presentation."
Day 23: "Coming back from your all-you-can-eat buffet lunch… at Gold Club."
Day 24: "Getting an expense report back."
Day 25: "When you think your idea for an agency holiday card was clever."
